title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Security
summary: Implement secure authentication mechanisms with multi-factor validation for customer logins.
description: Develop robust authentication functionality enabling users to securely log in to the portal using credentials combined with multi-factor verification methods. The EPIC ensures protection against unauthorized access and maintains compliance with security standards.

userStories.title: User Login and Registration
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to register and log into the portal securely so that I can access my banking services without visiting the branch.

userStories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
userStories.description: As a customer, I want an additional layer of security (OTP, biometric, or email verification) during login so that my account remains secure.

userStories.title: Password Recovery and Reset
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to reset my password through secure OTP verification so that I can regain access if I forget my password.

title: Responsive User Interface Development
summary: Design an intuitive and responsive UI delivering a consistent experience across devices.
description: Create user interface components that adapt seamlessly between desktop, tablet, and mobile. Ensure navigation, layout, and usability remain intuitive and consistent for customers.

userStories.title: Responsive Design Implementation
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the portal layout to automatically adjust to my device so that I have a seamless viewing experience.

userStories.title: User-Friendly Navigation
userStories.description: As a customer, I want clear menus and navigational cues so that I can easily access different parts of the portal.

title: Personalized Dashboard
summary: Build a personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking services and account details.
description: Develop a dynamic dashboard allowing customers to view their banking products, eligible services, and account summaries customized to their profile and access level.

userStories.title: Display Profile-Based Information
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see personalized information such as my accounts and eligible products so that I can manage my finances efficiently.

userStories.title: Show Frequently Used Services
userStories.description: As a customer, I want quick access to frequently used services so that I can execute common actions faster.

title: Account Requests and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Allow customers to submit account requests and modify services efficiently.
description: Develop streamlined workflows for submitting account opening requests and modifying existing services with minimal steps. Enable saving incomplete applications and resuming later.

userStories.title: Submit Account Opening Requests
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to open new accounts via the portal so that I donâ€™t need to visit the bank branch.

userStories.title: Modify Existing Account Services
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to request modifications to existing services so that I can manage my accounts digitally.

userStories.title: Save and Resume Applications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to save my incomplete application and resume later so that I can complete it at my convenience.

title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
summary: Provide request progress tracking and automated email notifications.
description: Implement a notification system that informs customers in real time about the progress of their account and service requests, sending timely email alerts and dashboard status updates.

userStories.title: Real-Time Request Status Tracking
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my service requests in real time so that I stay informed.

userStories.title: Email Notifications on Updates
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to receive automated emails when my requests are updated so that I am kept informed without logging in.

title: Secure Document Upload and Management
summary: Enable users to upload and manage necessary banking documents securely.
description: Build a secure system for uploading, validating, and storing user documents needed for service requests, ensuring proper encryption and compliance with data privacy standards.

userStories.title: Upload Required Documentation
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to upload supporting documents directly from the portal so that my account requests can be processed faster.

userStories.title: Manage Uploaded Documents
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view or replace uploaded documents so that I can ensure correct details are submitted.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement access controls to manage user privileges and visibility.
description: Develop a comprehensive role-based access system where customers and staff can only view and access authorized data and services, ensuring compliance and minimizing risks.

userStories.title: Define User Roles and Permissions
userStories.description: As an admin, I want to create and assign user roles so that customers can only access relevant sections of the portal.

userStories.title: Restrict Unauthorized Access
userStories.description: As a system, I want to block unauthorized role access so that sensitive data remains secure.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the portal with core banking systems for data synchronization.
description: Implement integration layers allowing two-way communication between the portal and existing core banking systems. Ensure data consistency, reliability, and performance optimization between platforms.

userStories.title: API-Based Data Synchronization
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to synchronize customer data via APIs so that all systems display consistent information.

userStories.title: Manage Integration Failures
userStories.description: As a system, I want robust error handling for integration failures so that data consistency is maintained.

title: Data Security and Interaction History
summary: Implement secure data storage, encryption, and comprehensive audit trails.
description: Build encryption mechanisms for sensitive information and maintain full tracking of user interactions and changes. The EPIC ensures compliance with data regulations and provides transparency in user actions.

userStories.title: Secure Data Encryption
userStories.description: As a system, I want to store user information in encrypted form so that sensitive data is protected from breaches.

userStories.title: Maintain User Interaction History
userStories.description: As a customer, I want a complete history of my transactions and service requests so that I can review past activities anytime.
